extendedInfo.description: It has the best graphing experience available on the Play Store.Draw functions, find intersections and show a table of values of the functions with an easy to use interface.  Use the following unique features to help you with your Calculus and Algebra class:*Symbolic Differentiation*Definite Integrals*Calculate Taylor-series*Solve EquationsAlgeo has every feature a scientific calculator needs:*Trigonometric and Hyperbolic Functions*Radians and Degree Support*Result History*Variables*Scientific Notation*Supports Landscape ModeIf you need help press Menu button -> Help or send an e-mail!If trigonometric functions give an incorrect answer, make sure you are in the correct angle mode. You can check it in the upper right corner. To change it press more->DEG/RAD.To use the advanced functions press the button 'more'.

reviews.title: simple and powerfull
reviews.comment: very intuitive interfaz , simple and powerfull helper in the pocket . great app !
reviews.author: Mario Rodriguez

reviews.title: Plain Awesome
reviews.comment: I dont even need to buy a $100 graphing calculator. I can easily do almost everything a $100 graphing calculator does. It has been very helpful. And I use it almost everyday. I use it for physics for calculus. Works perfectly.
reviews.author: Bibek Khanal

reviews.title: Great calculator
reviews.comment: Having a graduate degree in engineering,  I\'ve had to quite complex calculations.   I can do most graphing features right here.   Awesome app!
reviews.author: Andrew Lane

reviews.title: Excellent, but missing one common feature
reviews.comment: Nearly perfect for my needs, but although you can go back and edit a calculation, you can\'t select, cut paste etc either your previous calculations, or your previous answers.
reviews.author: Hugh Campbell

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: I\'m not really fond of the UI, but this does almost everything you would need to do on a graphing calculator. Perfect.
reviews.author: mike grad

reviews.title: Almost Too Good
reviews.comment: I\'ld rate 5 stars if a copy and paste was implemented even if it meant conversion to plain text and lots of parethesis\'.
reviews.author: Mark Underwood

reviews.title: Needs menu button
reviews.comment: HTC decided to make a bold move in their designs and stop including a physical menu button. This has had a terrible effect since many apps including this one do not have an onscreen. As a result I am unable to use the graphing capability which is why I have this calculator app in the first place. PLEASE add this. I absolutely love this app but as is it is not usable for me.
reviews.author: Ethan Van Goor

reviews.title: Does not do trig properly
reviews.comment: Trig functions have issues, tan(pi/2) should return undefined etc, not a approximation
reviews.author: Raymond Zeng

reviews.title: Where\'s the menu button?
reviews.comment: It seems fine, but I\'m frustrated that I cant find the menu anywhere and graphing is the one I need. Is it obvious to everyone except me?
reviews.author: Lynn Le

reviews.title: Best calculator and graphing app ever
reviews.comment: Does all the advanced calf and physics stuff for me. Should have had it a lot harder if it wasn\'t for this app. Would have paid a lot for this.
reviews.author: Ngu Tangang

reviews.title: Pretty solid but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to find out how to make the base of log anything other than 10. It works great otherwise, but that\'s one thing that I\'d like added.
reviews.author: Darrien Glasser

reviews.title: Hands down best and most user friendly calculator out there
reviews.comment: This is such an elegant calculator with the ability to view, edit and recall all your answers as well as the ability to tell you the value of the field as you actively type into it and whether you have errors or not. The graphing function is flawless and this has all the functions you need for engineering.
reviews.author: King Gnarthur

reviews.title: Amazingly Powerful
reviews.comment: I cannot believe how awesome this app is.  It\'s quick and powerful and easily replaces the need to ever buy an expensive calculator.  I used it throughout college and appreciated it every class.
reviews.author: Kameron Kantor

reviews.title: Setting domain
reviews.comment: Some functions have domain restrictions. Was not able to set domain while graphing. While using tables there was an option for setting range. Please fix this. It\'s a good app with lots of functions available.
reviews.author: Deepika Rajanala

reviews.title: My Review
reviews.comment: This has to be one of the most useful apps (A must have)!!!! I used to have to wait until I got home to use my graphical calculator, but now its in my pocket. It isn\'t a full blown Texas Instrument, but it does the basics well. I\'m very pleased someone thought to make something like this.
reviews.author: Euan Phipps

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: It\'s difficult to use, and it doesn\'t have many features. The background also burns my eyes.
reviews.author: Fatemeh Ghiasi

reviews.title: Best calculator
reviews.comment: Helped me out a lot taking Algebra 2 freshman year in high school
reviews.author: Alex Rivas

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: If you take calculus and can\'t afford a graphing calculator, I highly recommend downloading this app! It\'s great and does things like definite integrals and differentiation! It sure makes calculus homework easier!
reviews.author: Jaki Zepeda

reviews.title: Great calculator
reviews.comment: The only problem I have with this is the absence of inverse operations. Add these and this calculator will be golden.
reviews.author: Josh Goskowsky

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: I think this application is useful for students, and also teacher, but I want you update your app with the solve derivative and integral right now?ok, I hope you can do it for everyone and also me-----!
reviews.author: Kuon Menghuot
